talents.name: Vengeful Retreat
talents.description:
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take $198813s2 Physical damage$?s320635[ and have their movement speed reduced by $198813s1% for $198813d][].$?a203551[
|cFFFFFFFFGenerates ${($203650s1/5)*$203650d} Fury over $203650d if you damage an enemy.|r][]

talents.name: Blazing Path
talents.description: $?a212613[Infernal Strike][Fel Rush] gains an additional charge.

talents.name: Sigil of Misery
talents.description:
Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after $d.
Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for $207685d.

talents.name: Vengeful Bonds
talents.description: Vengeful Retreat reduces the movement speed of all nearby enemies by $198813s1% for $198813d.

talents.name: Unrestrained Fury
talents.description: Increases maximum Fury by $s1.

talents.name: Shattered Restoration
talents.description: The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by $s1%.

talents.name: Improved Sigil of Misery
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sigil of Misery by ${$s1/-1000} sec.

talents.name: Bouncing Glaives
talents.description: Throw Glaive ricochets to $s1 additional $ltarget:targets;.

talents.name: Imprison
talents.description: Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for $d. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.

talents.name: Charred Warblades
talents.description: You heal for $s1% of all Fire damage you deal.

talents.name: Chaos Nova
talents.description:
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing $s2 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for $d.$?s320412[
Each enemy stunned by Chaos Nova has a $s3% chance to generate a Lesser Soul Fragment.][]

talents.name: Improved Disrupt
talents.description: Increases the range of Disrupt to ${$s2+$s1} yds.

talents.name: Consume Magic
talents.description: Consume $m1 beneficial Magic effect removing it from the target$?s320313[ and granting you $s2 Fury][].

talents.name: Aldrachi Design
talents.description: Increases your chance to parry by $s1%.

talents.name: Chaos Fragments
talents.description: Each enemy stunned by Chaos Nova has a $179057s3% chance to generate a Lesser Soul Fragment.

talents.name: Master of the Glaive
talents.description: Throw Glaive has ${$s2+1} charges and snares all enemies hit by $213405s1% for $213405d.

talents.name: Champion of the Glaive
talents.description: Throw Glaive has ${$s2+1} charges and $s1 yard increased range.

talents.name: Disrupting Fury
talents.description: Disrupt generates $218903s1 Fury on a successful interrupt.

talents.name: Felblade
talents.description:
Charge to your target and deal $213243sw2 $@spelldesc395020 damage.
$?s263642[Fracture has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.
|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $213243s3 Fury.|r]?s203513[Shear has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.
|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $213243s3 Fury.|r]?a203555[Demon Blades has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.
|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $213243s3 Fury.|r][Demon's Bite has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.
|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $213243s3 Fury.|r]

talents.name: Swallowed Anger
talents.description: Consume Magic generates $278326s2 Fury when a beneficial Magic effect is successfully removed from the target.

talents.name: Aura of Pain
talents.description: Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by $s1%.

talents.name: Live by the Glaive
talents.description:
When you parry an attack or have one of your attacks parried, restore $428608s2% of max health and $428608s1 Fury.
This effect may only occur once every $s1 sec.

talents.name: Pursuit
talents.description: Mastery increases your movement speed.

talents.name: Soul Rending
talents.description:
Leech increased by $s1%.
Gain an additional $s2% leech while Metamorphosis is active.

talents.name: Infernal Armor
talents.description: Immolation Aura increases your armor by $s1% and causes melee attackers to suffer ${$320334s1/$s3} $@spelldesc395020 damage.

talents.name: Lost in Darkness
talents.description: Spectral Sight has ${$s1/-1000} sec reduced cooldown and no longer reduces movement speed.

talents.name: Felfire Haste
talents.description: $?c1[Fel Rush][Infernal Strike] increases your movement speed by $389847s1% for $389847d.

talents.name: Illidari Knowledge
talents.description: Reduces magic damage taken by $s1%.

talents.name: Will of the Illidari
talents.description: Increases maximum health by $s1%.

talents.name: Precise Sigils
talents.description: All Sigils are now placed at your target's location.

talents.name: Internal Struggle
talents.description: Increases your mastery by ${$s1*$mas}.1%.

talents.name: Darkness
talents.description:
Summons darkness around you in a$?a357419[ 12 yd][n 8 yd] radius, granting friendly targets a $209426s2% chance to avoid all damage from an attack. Lasts $d.
Chance to avoid damage increased by $s3% when not in a raid.

talents.name: Soul Sigils
talents.description: Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates $m1 Lesser Soul $LFragment:Fragments;.

talents.name: Quickened Sigils
talents.description: All Sigils activate ${$s1/-1000} second faster.

talents.name: Erratic Felheart
talents.description: The cooldown of $?a212613[Infernal Strike ][Fel Rush ]is reduced by ${-1*$s1}%.

talents.name: Pitch Black
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Darkness by ${$s1/-1000} sec.

talents.name: Long Night
talents.description: Increases the duration of Darkness by ${$s1/1000} sec.

talents.name: Rush of Chaos
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by ${$m1/-1000} sec.

talents.name: Demon Muzzle
talents.description: Enemies deal $s1% reduced magic damage to you for $394933d after being afflicted by one of your Sigils.

talents.name: Flames of Fury
talents.description: Sigil of Flame deals $s2% increased damage and generates $s1 additional Fury per target hit.

talents.name: Sigil of Spite
talents.description:
Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after $d.
Detonates to deal $389860s1 Chaos damage and shatter up to $s3 Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond $s1 targets.

talents.name: Fel Devastation
talents.description: Unleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you for ${$212105s1*(2/$t1)} Fire damage over $d.$?s320639[ Causing damage also heals you for up to ${$212106s1*(2/$t1)} health.][]

talents.name: Frailty
talents.description:
Enemies struck by Sigil of Flame are afflicted with Frailty for $247456d.
You heal for $247456s1% of all damage you deal to targets with Frailty.

talents.name: Fiery Brand
talents.description: Brand an enemy with a demonic symbol, instantly dealing $s2 Fire damage$?s320962[ and ${$207771s5*$207771d} Fire damage over $207771d][]. The enemy's damage done to you is reduced by $s1% for $207744d.

talents.name: Demon Blades
talents.description: Your auto attacks deal an additional $203796s1 $@spelldesc395041 damage and generate $203796m2-$203796M2 Fury.

talents.name: Insatiable Hunger
talents.description: Demon's Bite deals $s2% more damage and generates $s3 to $s4 additional Fury.

talents.name: Fracture
talents.description:
Rapidly slash your target for ${$225919sw1+$225921sw1} Physical damage, and shatter $s1 Lesser Soul Fragments from them.
|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $s4 Fury.|r

talents.name: Shear Fury
talents.description: Shear generates $s1 additional Fury.

talents.name: Improved Fel Rush
talents.description: Fel Rush damage increased by $s1%.

talents.name: Deflecting Spikes
talents.description: Demon Spikes also increases your Parry chance by $203819s1% for $203819d.

talents.name: Ascending Flame
talents.description:
Sigil of Flame's initial damage is increased by $s2%.
Multiple applications of Sigil of Flame may overlap.

talents.name: Perfectly Balanced Glaive
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Throw Glaive by ${$abs($s0/1000)} sec.

talents.name: Calcified Spikes
talents.description: You take $391171s2% reduced damage after Demon Spikes ends, fading by 1% per second.

talents.name: Sigil of Silence
talents.description:
Place a Sigil of Silence at the target location that activates after $d.
Silences all enemies affected by the sigil for $204490d.

talents.name: Roaring Fire
talents.description: Fel Devastation heals you for up to $s1% more, based on your missing health.

talents.name: Retaliation
talents.description: While Demon Spikes is active, melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take $391159s1 Physical damage. Generates high threat.

talents.name: Meteoric Strikes
talents.description: Reduce the cooldown of Infernal Strike by ${$s1/-1000} sec.

talents.name: Spirit Bomb
talents.description: Consume up to $s2 available Soul Fragments then explode, damaging nearby enemies for $247455s1 Fire damage per fragment consumed, and afflicting them with Frailty for $247456d, causing you to heal for $247456s1% of damage you deal to them. Deals reduced damage beyond $s3 targets.

talents.name: Agonizing Flames
talents.description: Immolation Aura increases your movement speed by $s1% and its duration is increased by $s2%.

talents.name: Extended Spikes
talents.description: Increases the duration of Demon Spikes by ${$s1/1000} sec.

talents.name: Burning Blood
talents.description: Fire damage increased by $s1%.

talents.name: Revel in Pain
talents.description: When Fiery Brand expires on your primary target, you gain a shield that absorbs up ${$AP*($s2/100)*(1+$@versadmg)} damage for $343013d, based on your damage dealt to them while Fiery Brand was active.

talents.name: Void Reaver
talents.description:
Frailty now also reduces all damage you take from afflicted targets by $s2%.
Enemies struck by Soul Cleave are afflicted with Frailty for $247456d.

talents.name: Fallout
talents.description: Immolation Aura's initial burst has a chance to shatter Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies.

talents.name: Ruinous Bulwark
talents.description: Fel Devastation heals for an additional $s1%, and $s2% of its healing is converted into an absorb shield for $326863d.

talents.name: Volatile Flameblood
talents.description:
Immolation Aura generates $m-$M Fury when it deals critical damage.
This effect may only occur once per ${$proccooldown+0.1} sec.

talents.name: Bulk Extraction
talents.description: Demolish the spirit of all those around you, dealing $s1 Fire damage to nearby enemies and extracting up to $s2 Lesser Soul Fragments, drawing them to you for immediate consumption.

talents.name: Soul Barrier
talents.description:
Shield yourself for $d, absorbing $<baseAbsorb> damage.
Consumes all available Soul Fragments to add $<fragmentAbsorb> to the shield per fragment.

talents.name: Fel Flame Fortification
talents.description: You take $393009s1% reduced magic damage while Immolation Aura is active.

talents.name: Soul Furnace
talents.description: Every $391166u Soul Fragments you consume increases the damage of your next Soul Cleave or Spirit Bomb by $391172s1%.

talents.name: Painbringer
talents.description:
Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces all damage you take by $s1% for $212988d.
Multiple applications may overlap.

talents.name: Sigil of Chains
talents.description:
Place a Sigil of Chains at the target location that activates after $d.
All enemies affected by the sigil are pulled to its center and are snared, reducing movement speed by $204843s1% for $204843d.

talents.name: Fiery Demise
talents.description: Fiery Brand also increases Fire damage you deal to the target by $s1%.

talents.name: Chains of Anger
talents.description: Increases the duration of your Sigils by ${$s2/1000} sec and radius by $s1 yds.

talents.name: Focused Cleave
talents.description: Soul Cleave deals $s1% increased damage to your primary target.

talents.name: Soulmonger
talents.description: When consuming a Soul Fragment would heal you above full health it shields you instead, up to a maximum of ${$MHP*$s1/100}.

talents.name: Stoke the Flames
talents.description: Fel Devastation damage increased by $s1%.

talents.name: Restless Hunter
talents.description: Leaving demon form grants a charge of Fel Rush and increases the damage of your next Blade Dance by $390212s1%.

talents.name: Burning Alive
talents.description: Every $207771t3 sec, Fiery Brand spreads to one nearby enemy.

talents.name: Cycle of Binding
talents.description: Sigil of Flame reduces the cooldown of your Sigils by $s1 sec.

talents.name: Vulnerability
talents.description: Frailty now also increases all damage you deal to afflicted targets by $s1%.

talents.name: Feed the Demon
talents.description: Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces the remaining cooldown of Demon Spikes by ${$s1/100}.2 sec.

talents.name: Charred Flesh
talents.description: Immolation Aura damage increases the duration of your Fiery Brand and Sigil of Flame by ${$s1/1000}.2 sec.

talents.name: Soulcrush
talents.description:
Multiple applications of Frailty may overlap.
Soul Cleave applies Frailty to your primary target for $s2 sec.

talents.name: Soul Carver
talents.description: Carve into the soul of your target, dealing ${$s2+$214743s1} Fire damage and an additional $o1 Fire damage over $d.  Immediately shatters $s3 Lesser Soul Fragments from the target and $s4 additional Lesser Soul Fragment every $t1 sec.

talents.name: Last Resort
talents.description:
Sustaining fatal damage instead transforms you to Metamorphosis form.
This may occur once every $209261d.

talents.name: Darkglare Boon
talents.description: When Fel Devastation finishes fully channeling, it refreshes $s1-$s2% of its cooldown and refunds $s3-$s4 Fury.

talents.name: Down in Flames
talents.description: Fiery Brand has ${$s1/-1000} sec reduced cooldown and $s2 additional $lcharge:charges;.

talents.name: Illuminated Sigils
talents.description:
Sigil of Flame has ${$s3/-1000} sec reduced cooldown and $s1 additional $lcharge:charges;.
You have $s2% increased chance to parry attacks from enemies afflicted by your Sigil of Flame.

talents.name: Art of the Glaive
talents.description:
Consuming $?a212612[$s1][$s2] Soul Fragments or casting The Hunt converts your next Throw Glaive into Reaver's Glaive.
$@spellicon442294 $@spellname442294:
$@spelldesc442294

talents.name: Fury of the Aldrachi
talents.description:
When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, $?a212612[Blade Dance][Soul Cleave] casts $s2 additional glaive slashes to nearby targets.
If cast after $?a212612[Chaos Strike]?s263642[Fracture][Shear], cast $?a1236360[${($s2*($s1/100+1))+$1236360s1}][${$s2*($s1/100+1)}] slashes instead.

talents.name: Evasive Action
talents.description: Vengeful Retreat can be cast a second time within $444929d.

talents.name: Unhindered Assault
talents.description: Vengeful Retreat resets the cooldown of Felblade.

talents.name: Reaver's Mark
talents.description:
When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, $?a212612[Chaos Strike]?s263642[Fracture][Shear] applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take $442624s1% increased damage for $442624d. Max $442624u stacks.
Applies $m2 additional $Lstack:stacks; of Reaver's Mark If cast after $?a212612[Blade Dance][Soul Cleave].

talents.name: Aldrachi Tactics
talents.description: The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.

talents.name: Army Unto Oneself
talents.description: Felblade surrounds you with a Blade Ward, reducing damage taken by $442715s1% for $442715d.

talents.name: Incorruptible Spirit
talents.description: Each Soul Fragment you consume shields you for an additional $s1% of the amount healed.

talents.name: Wounded Quarry
talents.description: Expose weaknesses in the target of your $@spellname442624, causing your Physical damage to any enemy to also deal $s1% of the damage dealt to your marked target as Chaos, and sometimes shatter a Lesser Soul Fragment.

talents.name: Incisive Blade
talents.description: $?a212612[Chaos Strike][Soul Cleave] deals $s1% increased damage.

talents.name: Keen Engagement
talents.description: Reaver's Glaive generates $s1 Fury.

talents.name: Preemptive Strike
talents.description: Throw Glaive deals $444979s1 Physical damage to enemies near its initial target.

talents.name: Warblade's Hunger
talents.description:
Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next $?a212612[Chaos Strike]?s263642[Fracture][Shear] to deal $442507s1 additional Physical damage.$?a212612[
Felblade consumes up to $s2 nearby Soul Fragments.][]

talents.name: Thrill of the Fight
talents.description: After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing your attack speed by $442695s1% for $442695d and your damage and healing by $442688s1% for $442688d.
